1088251937.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

items.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

AND.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

NOT.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

OR.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

all.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

all_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

any.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

1088251937.title: Filter Group

heightmap.description: Defines the heightmap filter for initial entity placement during chunk loading.

spawn_obstruction_predicate.description: Checks for obstructions that might prevent entity spawning.

spawn_predicate.description: Determines if an entity is valid to spawn based on specific conditions.

type.description: Specifies the environment where the entity can spawn (e.g., on ground, in water, etc.).

entity_type.description: Specifies the entity type to spawn when selected

min_guaranteed.description: The minimum number of this permutation's entity to spawn

weight.description: The likelihood of this to be selected over the combined weight of all the entities in the permutation

biome_filter.description: Filter to limit spawns to specific biomes.

herds.description: Configurations for size and events when spawning groups of entities

mob_event_filter.description: Filter to exclude entities if the event is disabled.

permute_types.description: List of randomly choosable permutations of the entity

weight.description: The weight used when comparing other entities that can  spawn within a biome

domain.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

subject.description: The subject of this filter test.

test.description: The name of the test to apply.

value.description: The value being compared with the test.

event.description: An event to run after 'event_skip_count' number of entities in the group have spawned

event_skip_count.description: Number of entities spawned in the group to skip before running the event

initial_event.description: Event run for the first 'initial_event_count' number of the group are placed.

initial_event_count.description: Number of times that 'initial_event' can run

max.description: Maximum number of entities in this group to attempt to spawn

min.description: Minimum number of entities in this group to attempt to spawn
